{"id":600997808,"lang":"java","time":"1 week, 2 days","timestamp":1639361687,"status_display":"Accepted","runtime":"1 ms","url":"/submissions/detail/600997808/","is_pending":"Not Pending","title":"Consecutive Characters","memory":"37.5 MB","code":"class Solution {\n    public int maxPower(String s) {\n        \n        int count = 0;\n        int maxCount = 0;\n        char previous = ' ';\n        for (int i = 0; i < s.length(); i++) {\n            char c = s.charAt(i);\n            if (c == previous) {\n                count++;\n            } else {\n                count = 1;\n                previous = c;\n            }\n            maxCount = Math.max(maxCount, count);\n        }\n        return maxCount;\n    }\n}","compare_result":"","title_slug":"consecutive-characters"}
